header.name: Andrew Millen
header.about: As a design leader with 10 years of expertise in UI/UX and design systems, I consistently deliver business value through the practice of user-centered design, while strengthening teams through peer mentorship and close collaboration with front-end developers.

description: Led creation of new design system that tripled dev velocity, addressed critical accessibility issues, and facilitated growth into multi-product platform
Revitalized workplace experience offerings with an all-new employee dashboard, leading to a 14% jump in MAUs and up to a 200% increase in usage of key features

Conducted discovery and design for a business intelligence reporting add-on that streamlined data workflows for enterprise customers, powering a 10% NRR uplift and achieving 14x adoption growth over two years
Fostered growth of our design practice through leadership of User Insights Program, implementation of new prototyping tools, and creation of strategic design principles
Oversaw design and dev teams in the production of websites, apps, and real-world experiences, including the implementation of creative growth programs
Designed and built responsive, performant websites and apps on a variety of platforms using React/JS, HTML/CSS, and PHP
Developed additional skills in motion graphics, 3D, and projection mapping to create rich interactive experiences that earned 2 Gold and 4 Silver Addy’s
Worked directly with clients ranging from local non-profits to Fortune-500s
Led discovery, design, and development of web and interactive projects
Expanded service offerings by providing site architecture, content strategy, and brand voice guidelines that enriched the client experience
Helped grow the business from a solo founder to a 3-person team that was later acquired

community.name: AIGA Memphis
community.role: Executive Board Member, Director of Communications
